a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Threshold income per day marking the poorest decile (after vs. before
The level of income per day below which 10% of the population falls. This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in

Note: This data is expressed in
international-$
at 2021 prices.
